item.description: I’m currently a Post-Doctoral Fellow in Behavioral Economics at JEDI lab at Linköping University in Sweden 🇸🇪 and an Associate Professor in Organizational Behavior at Oslo Business School (OsloMet) in Oslo, Norway 🇳🇴. I completed my PhD in Leadership and Organisation at BI Norwegian Business School´s Department of Leadership and Organizational Behavior (2023, supervised by Professor Thorvald Hærem and Associate Professor Erik Løhre). My dissertation examined the role of emotions and psychological distance in decision-making under risk and uncertainty.
